mapper.insert:
insert into node_cmd (nc_id, node_id, ncg_id, nc_content, nc_name, scene_sn,node_sn) values
(#{nc.ncId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nc.nodeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nc.ncgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nc.ncContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nc.ncName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nc.sceneSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nc.nodeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
